channel.title: Project Absol [803 Master-Piece Remake!]
channel.description:
Hello guys, This is about 40% complete in creation, and am requesting help from the community after this post for some help, testers, recommendations, and java-programmers with some decent knowledge of RSPS. My current projects are to add in min-games.
[img]http://img3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20111125185729/runescape/images/a/a7/Manual_Activites.png[/img] [size=14pt]Activities Progress[/size] Duel-Arena Fist of Guthix Clan Wars All Fired Up Pyramid Plunder Castle Wars Barbarian Assault Barrows Conquest God Wars Dominion Tower Soul Wars Pest Control
[img]http://i1383.photobucket.com/albums/ah284/projectabsol/pic1_zps03d6ca7d.png[/img] [img]http://i1383.photobucket.com/albums/ah284/projectabsol/pic21_zps757c7b31.png[/img] [img]http://i1383.photobucket.com/albums/ah284/projectabsol/pic17_zpsc07a5d07.png[/img] [img]http://i1383.photobucket.com/albums/ah284/projectabsol/pic19_zps3d8d21f8.png[/img] [img]http://i1383.photobucket.com/albums/ah284/projectabsol/pic20_zps4fd95e06.png[/img] [img]http://i1383.photobucket.com/albums/ah284/projectabsol/pic15_zpscccb4fb4.png[/img] [img]http://i1383.photobucket.com/albums/ah284/projectabsol/pic16_zps686e2b41.png[/img] [img]http://i1383.photobucket.com/albums/ah284/projectabsol/pic13_zpsac61124e.png[/img] [img]http://i1383.photobucket.com/albums/ah284/projectabsol/pic14_zps8eb62203.png[/img] [img]http://i1383.photobucket.com/albums/ah284/projectabsol/pic12_zps01d134ec.png[/img] [img]http://i1383.photobucket.com/albums/ah284/projectabsol/pic11_zps4bb2c928.png[/img] [img]http://i1383.photobucket.com/albums/ah284/projectabsol/pic8_zps3229bb1e.png[/img] [img]http://i1383.photobucket.com/albums/ah284/projectabsol/pic9_zpsb930661c.png[/img] [img]http://i1383.photobucket.com/albums/ah284/projectabsol/pic7_zps4a0afc31.png[/img] [img]http://i1383.photobucket.com/albums/ah284/projectabsol/pic4_zps18d8dbb6.png[/img] [img]http://i1383.photobucket.com/albums/ah284/projectabsol/pic5_zps77fa2a98.png[/img] [img]http://i1383.photobucket.com/albums/ah284/projectabsol/pic3_zps1d367fb8.png[/img] [img]http://i1383.photobucket.com/albums/ah284/projectabsol/pic6_zps56a04533.png[/img] [img]http://i1383.photobucket.com/albums/ah284/projectabsol/pic1_zps03d6ca7d.png[/img] [img]http://i1383.photobucket.com/albums/ah284/projectabsol/pic2_zps4d8e0ce0.png[/img] [img]http://i1383.photobucket.com/albums/ah284/projectabsol/PIC10_zps591504fa.png[/img]
STILL IN DEVELOPMENT AND LOTS TO COMPLETE! If you would like to help, please message me on here, and i will see about letting you on the development team. :)!
(Will add in more information about the server later in the day! Kinda busy right now)

item.title: Project Absol [803 Master-Piece Remake!]
item.dc:creator: @InfusedScape InfusedScape
item.description:
@InfusedScape wrote:

Sounds like a plan. Good luck with this server man!

Read full topic

item.title: Project Absol [803 Master-Piece Remake!]
item.dc:creator: @Korres Korres
item.description:
@Korres wrote:

My original plan was to bring this server to match Runescape that is out now, but i figured, why would someone play this when they can just play Runescape with a lot more people?

Well, my plan now is to complete all the content and begin to change stuff around a little bit that would bring people the ultimate Rsps experience, and also have LOTS to do during their gameplay.

So to answer your question, itâ€™s more aimed towards both of them basically. Older and newer.

Read full topic

item.title: Project Absol [803 Master-Piece Remake!]
item.dc:creator: @InfusedScape InfusedScape
item.description:
@InfusedScape wrote:

Are you remaking an older RS with this base like the old shops, placements, and such or are you going for the time of the 803 and making the remake off of that?

Read full topic

item.title: Project Absol [803 Master-Piece Remake!]

item.description:
@Korres wrote:

Hello guys, This is about 40% complete in creation, and am requesting help from the community after this post for some help, testers, recommendations, and java-programmers with some decent knowledge of RSPS. My current projects are to add in min-games.

If you would like to help, please message me on here, and i will see about letting you on the development team. :)!
